CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'Not yet started'), CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'Client not contacted/responded') ), 'Not Started', IF( OR( /* ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, '7. Rejected all offers or cancelled. PMP closed.'),*/ ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Not Migrating'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Customer inclined to move forward with FMS time recording. PMP closed.'), CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'declined'), CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'Rejected all offers or cancelled.'), CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'Declined') ), 'Completed – Declined', IF( /* ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Customer cancelling Intapp product(s). PMP closed.'),*/ OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'cancelling'), CONTAINS(TEXT(PMP_Stage__c),'Cancelled') ), 'Completed – Cancelled', IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, '5. Migration Opportunity confirmed and created. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, '6. Sales Opportunity confirmed and created. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Confirmation of workflows in production. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Opportunity confirmed and created. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Objective successful. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Conversion to Time 8 confirmed. Opportunity created. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Customer accepted 3-year Walls offer. PMP closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Customer review complete - firm does not require HF. PMP Closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Customer review complete - firm does not require rule update. PMP Closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Customer has completed analysis and remediation. PMP Closed.'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Opportunity Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Committed / In Contracts'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Sales Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Client contacted, not an opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Client contacted, opportunity recorded'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Client contacted, already a RAPTOR customer'), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c, 'Request Complete') ), 'Completed – Successful', 'In Progress' ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: PMP Simple Stage
